snippet: Betting its future on natural gas, Shell is building a giant vessel that will float over a gas field off the coast of Australia, housing a massive processing plant, so that the product can be transported just about anywhere.
abstract: Royal Dutch Shell, betting its future on natural gas, is building giant vessel that will float over gas field off the coast of Australia; ship will house massive processing plant, so that the product can be transported just about anywhere.
lead_paragraph: Betting its future on natural gas, Shell is building a giant vessel that will float over a gas field off the coast of Australia, housing a massive processing plant, so that the product can be transported just about anywhere.

headline.seo: Shell Bets on a Colossal Floating Natural Gas Factory Off Australia
headline.main: Shell Bets on a Colossal Floating Liquefied Natural Gas Factory Off Australia
headline.print_headline: Shell Bets on a Colossal Floating Liquefied Natural Gas Factory Off Australia
